Additionally, the accommodation and dive planning were executed flawlessly. Everything was well-organized, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable experience from start to finish. No blur sotong for sure!

Colourful and more importantly safe dive in Tioman with Simply Scuba for our Advance Open Water, led by Chris.

He planned the itinerary to ensure we had maximum dives and minimum down time wasted on waiting around for transport, and no annual leave needed cos we left on Friday evening and came back by Sunday evening

When the weather turned ugly, he ensured we still managed to complete our objective of finishing our course, safely of course.

Joined them for some leisure dives in Tioman over the Easter long weekend. Chris and his instructor Sky were friendly, informative and accommodating and everything was seamlessly organised. Their schedule is also more flexible as they have their own boat compared to other operators who rely on the public ferry service between Mersing and Tioman with fixed timings. Shoutout to Sky who even treated us to food and beer out of his own pocket. Would definitely recommend!

Simply Scuba provided a truly exceptional diving experience!

Special shout out to the Dive Masters and Instructors: Samuel Ho, Carol, Skye, Nury and Errick for their professionalism, enthusiastic energy,  and experiential sharing.

The trip was incredibly well-organized, from start to finish, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable adventure. The team's professionalism and expertise made me feel safe and confident throughout the entire journey.

Not only was the trip fun and exciting, but the positive energy and enthusiasm of the staff added an extra layer of enjoyment. I highly recommend Simply Scuba for anyone looking for a top-notch diving experience. Five stars all the way!
